name: Jumper Jon - Protoype
description:
Get into hell and help Jon reach the lovely Jane!

You just have 30 seconds! >:)

Help Jon, the tiny devil, reach the beautiful Jane and fight nasty creatures with his special spinning attack on this retro style platformer from hell!

Every 30 seconds Jon will die but he will respawn and keep the items and abilities he already obtained.

+ How To Play +

Web Browser

[W][A][S][D] - Move
[Z][M] - Jump and Spin
[Space] - Activate Soul Strike
[Tab] - Pause

Mobile

Arrow buttons - Move
Action button - Jump and Spin
SS button - Activate Soul Strike
Pause button - Pause

+ About Level Editor +

There is an Ascii Level Editor on game, in this editor every in-game element has to be set with a character on the Text Area:

j - Jon (main character)
n - Jane (lovely Jane)
# - Tile
x - Spike
< - Enemy (walking left)
> - Enemy (walking right)
{ - Spike enemy (walking left)
} - Spike enemy (walking right)
k - Key
d - Door (to open w/key)
i - Lever
l - Door (to open w/lever or switch)
f - Switch
= - Box (pushable)
) - Platform (moving right)
( - Platform (moving left)
